com.tokelon.toktales.extensions.core.tale

Interface ITaleLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaleLoader

    public interface ITaleLoader

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ITaleGamescene loadTale(String taleAppPath)
      Loads the tale for given path.
      void loadTaleIntoGame(String taleAppPath, String gamesceneName, String gamestateName)
      Loads the tale for the given path and creates a new gamestate with the given name, containing the resulting gamescene with the given scene name.
      void loadTaleIntoGamestate(String taleAppPath, String gamesceneName, IGameState gamestate)
      Loads the tale for the given path and adds the resulting gamescene to the given gamestate, with the given scene name.

    • Method Detail

      • loadTale

        ITaleGamescene loadTale(String taleAppPath)
                 throws TaleException
        Loads the tale for given path.
        Parameters:
        taleAppPath - The path to the tale directory.
        Returns:
        The resulting tale game scene.
        Throws:
        TaleException - If an error occurs while loading the tale.

      • loadTaleIntoGamestate

        void loadTaleIntoGamestate(String taleAppPath,
                           String gamesceneName,
                           IGameState gamestate)
                    throws TaleException
        Loads the tale for the given path and adds the resulting gamescene to the given gamestate, with the given scene name.
        Parameters:
        taleAppPath - The path to the tale directory.
        gamesceneName - The name with which the resulting scene should be added to the gamestate.
        gamestate - The gamestate to add the resulting scene to.
        Throws:
        TaleException - If an error occurs while loading the tale.

      • loadTaleIntoGame

        void loadTaleIntoGame(String taleAppPath,
                      String gamesceneName,
                      String gamestateName)
               throws TaleException
        Loads the tale for the given path and creates a new gamestate with the given name, containing the resulting gamescene with the given scene name.
        Parameters:
        taleAppPath - The path to the tale directory.
        gamesceneName - The name with which the resulting scene should be added to the gamestate.
        gamestateName - The name with which the resulting state should be added to the game.
        Throws:
        TaleException - If an error occurs while loading the tale.
